definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
diclofenac sodium (non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce swelling and as painkiller)/also called voltaren 扶他林
pinyin: er4 lu:4 ben3 an4 ben3 yi3 suan1 na4

sentences.english: It can be broken down to yield acetoacetate.
sentences.chinese: 它可以被分解成乙酰乙酸。

sentences.english: This article presents a new synthetic method of Thioglycolic Acid— reducing method of iron.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新的合成巯基乙酸的方法，即铁还原法。

sentences.english: This article introduces the preparation method of photographic-grade EDTA ferriammonium activated iron solution.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了照相级乙二胺四乙酸铁铵溶液的制备方法。

sentences.english: EA is oxidized completely and no partially oxidized side-products are formed over the catalysts.
sentences.chinese: 乙酸乙酯在催化剂上完全被氧化且无副产物生成。

sentences.english: In this method the interference come from inorganic sulfide was removed by Copper acetate homogenous precipitation met…
sentences.chinese: 水中无机硫化物的干扰用乙酸铜均匀沉淀法去除。

sentences.english: Study on the use of acetic anhydride as a co reagent of fatty acid to synthesize cellulose esters.
sentences.chinese: 采用乙酸酐为共反应剂合成了纤维素高级脂肪酸酯。

sentences.english: The technology of one step synthesis of terpinyl acetate from turpentine and glacial acetic acid is described.
sentences.chinese: 论述了松节油与冰乙酸一步法合成乙酸松油酯工艺。

sentences.english: The technology of one step synthesis of terpinyl acetate from turpentine and glacial acetic acid is described.
sentences.chinese: 论述了松节油与冰乙酸一步法合成乙酸松油酯工艺。

sentences.english: In this paper, the batch process to produce chloroacetic acid was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文重点介绍间歇式生产氯乙酸的工艺技术。

sentences.english: Some synthetic methods of phenylacetic acid and its uses were summarized in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 综述了苯乙酸的合成工艺路线及其应用。

sentences.english: Catalytic activity of six inorganic salts in the esterification of acetic acid with isoamyl alcohol was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了六种无机盐在乙酸异戊酯合成中的催化活性。

sentences.english: Conclusion Bidens ethyl acetate extract has a significant hypoglycemic activity.
sentences.chinese: 结论鬼针草乙酸乙酯提取物有显著的降糖活性。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the chemical constituents of the extracts of Ledum palustre L. Var.
sentences.chinese: 目的对细叶杜香乙酸乙酷部位的化学成分进行研究。

sentences.english: A credible gas chromatography method was established to determine the residual trichloroacetic acid in water.
sentences.chinese: 建立一种可靠的测定水中三氯乙酸含量的气相色谱法。

sentences.english: The kinetics of esterification of linalool with acetic anhydride was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了芳樟醇与乙酸酐酯化反应动力学。

sentences.english: The esterification of acetic acid with n-butanol by dealuminated USY zeolite was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了脱铝超稳Y沸石催化乙酸与正丁醇的酯化反应。

definition: ethanol C2H5OH/same as alcohol 酒精
